\algdef{SE}{PreLoop}{EndPreLoop}[1]{\textbf{pick} \(\mbox{#1}\) \textbf{do}}{\textbf{end}}
\algrenewcommand\algorithmicindent{1.0em} % Indentation (.5 is ~1 character)
\algtext*{EndIf}% Remove "end if" text
\begin{algorithm}[h]
  \caption{Given a doubly-linked dependency graph $G=\langle N,E \rangle$ this algorithm finds all maximal combinations of nodes that are not directly connected via a dependency edge}\label{pseudo:something}
  \begin{algorithmic}[1]
  \Procedure{FindAllSolutions}{$G$}
    \State $S = \emptyset$
    \ForAll{$n\in N$}
    \State $\textsc{SubSolutions}(S,\{n\})$
    \EndFor
    \State
    \Return $S$
    \EndProcedure

    \State

    \Procedure{SubSolutions}{$S,a$}
    \If{$\exists x\in S$ \textbf{where} $a\subseteq x$}
    \Return
    \EndIf
    \State $k = N \setminus a \cup (\bigcup\limits_{n\in a} n\bullet)$
    \If{$|k|=0$}
    \State $S = S \cup \{a\}$
    \EndIf
    \ForAll{$m\in k$}
    \State $\textsc{SubSolutions}(S,a \cup \{m\})$
    \EndFor
    \State
    \EndProcedure
  \end{algorithmic}
\end{algorithm}
